item.title: 特朗普抨击印度 "非常高 "的关税，莫迪寻求缓兵之计
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次批评印度的高关税，表示印度仍是将于 4 月 2 日生效的对等关税的目标。【原文：US President Donald Trump repeated his criticism of India’s high tariffs, indicating the country remains a target of reciprocal duties set to take effect April 2.】

item.title: K-Pop明星NewJeans在关键审判开始时惊喜亮相
item.description: 周五，决定 K-pop 红人 NewJeans 命运的审判开始了，这个女子组合的意外亮相标志着一场史无前例的行业反抗。【原文：A trial to decide the fate of K-pop sensation NewJeans began Friday with the surprise appearance of the girl group whose decision to ditch their label marked an unprecedented industry revolt.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的信托基金申请印度最大的房地产投资信托基金 IPO
item.description: 印度知识房地产信托公司（Knowledge Realty Trust）已申请批准首次公开发行 620 亿卢比（约合 7.11 亿美元）的股票，这可能是印度最大的房地产投资信托上市项目。【原文：India’s Knowledge Realty Trust has sought approval for an initial public offering of 62 billion rupees ($711 million), in what could be the nation’s largest real estate investment trust listing.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求废除《芯片法》的利害关系
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战和将制造业带回美国本土的努力将其前任的一项标志性成就推上了风口浪尖：《芯片与科学法案》。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war and efforts to bring manufacturing back to US shores have put one of his predecessor’s signature achievements on the firing line: the Chips and Science Act.】

item.title: Healthscope 获得 10 亿美元贷款利息支付缓缴令
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，澳大利亚医院运营商 Healthscope Ltd. 的贷款人已同意再给该公司两个月的时间来支付其至今无法支付的贷款利息。【原文：Lenders to Healthscope Ltd., an Australia hospital operator, have agreed to give the firm two more months to pay loan interest that it’s been unable to meet so far, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 净零增长与英国经济增长之间是否存在权衡？
item.description:
Peel Hunt的Kallum Pickering加入Merryn Talks Money 讨论地缘政治动荡如何使安全能源变得更加必要。【原文：

Peel Hunt’s Kallum Pickering joins Merryn Talks Money to discuss how geopolitical tumult has made secure energy more of an imperative. 

】

item.title: 南非如何填补 104 亿美元的预算缺口
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）需要填补预算缺口，因为十党联合政府否决了大幅提高增值税的提议。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana needs to plug a gaping hole in the budget after the nation’s 10-party coalition government shot down a proposal to sharply raise value-added tax.】

item.title: 瑞典房价在央行降息后开始回升
item.description: 瑞典上个月的房价继续走高，因为较低的借贷成本支撑着这个遭受了世界上最严重的大流行病后衰退之一的住房市场。【原文：Sweden’s home prices continued to advance last month as lower borrowing costs support a housing market that suffered one of the world’s worst post-pandemic slumps.】

item.title: 天然气成本下降吸引了对价格敏感的印度买家
item.description: 液化天然气价格下跌刺激了资金短缺的印度买家的需求，他们往往在价格下滑时进入市场。【原文：Falling LNG prices are spurring demand from cash-strapped Indian buyers, who often enter the market when prices slump.】

item.title: 尽管香港写字楼市场不景气，恒基仍吸引了更多租户
item.description: 香港恒基兆业广场已成为金融公司落户的新去处，因为开发商在写字楼市场不景气时吸引了其他摩天大楼的租户。【原文：The Henderson in Hong Kong has become a new destination for financial firms to set up shop, as the developer lures tenants away from other skyscrapers during an office market downturn.】

item.title: 阿尔弗雷德气旋缓慢而不稳定的路径给预报员带来挑战
item.description: 过去一周，威胁澳大利亚东南海岸的气旋路径蜿蜒曲折，这给预报员带来了挑战，因为他们要为风暴路径上的居民提供确定的路径。【原文：A cyclone threatening Australia’s southeast coast has taken a long and meandering path over the past week, challenging forecasters seeking to provide residents in the storm’s path with certainty on its track.】

item.title: 日本交易所的神秘大宗交易令投资者困惑不已
item.description: 日本贸易公司和保险公司接连出现异常大宗交易，令东京的投资者惶惶不安。【原文：A spate of unusually large block trades in Japanese trading houses and insurers has put investors on edge in Tokyo.】

item.title: 中国能源进口因供应过剩和需求疲软而下降
item.description: 在去年创纪录的煤炭和天然气运输量造成供应过剩、石油需求持续缓解之后，2025 年初中国的能源进口量普遍下降。【原文：Chinese energy imports broadly fell at the start of 2025, after last year’s record shipments of coal and gas created an overhang of supply and demand for oil continued to ease.】

item.title: 降息疑虑增加，中国债券出现今年最严重下滑
item.description: 中国基准主权债券收益率创下今年最大涨幅，原因是中国央行对进一步降息产生了疑虑，而股市上涨又吸引投资者远离政府债务。【原文：China’s benchmark sovereign bond yield jumped the most this year as the central bank sowed doubts over further interest-rate cuts and a stock rally lured investors away from government debt.】

item.title: 中国出口创下 5400 亿美元新纪录，急于躲避关税
item.description: 由于美国提高了关税，并威胁将征收更多的关税，促使中国提前装运货物，中国的出口量创下了今年迄今为止的最高纪录。【原文：China’s exports reached a record so far this year as higher US tariffs, and the threat of more to come, drove frontloading of shipments.】

item.title: 任天堂股价暴跌，绩优游戏股陷入停滞
item.description: 日本游戏制造商任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.）的股价创下了七个月来的最大跌幅，一些投资者将股价下跌归因于全球基金在市场动荡不安的情况下撤出了一些表现最好的公司。【原文：Shares of Japanese game maker Nintendo Co. plunged the most in seven months, with some investors attributing the drop to global funds pulling out from some of the best performers amid jittery markets.】

item.title: 中国科技对 "Mag Seven "的超越远未结束
item.description: 随着 DeepSeek 刺激了对亚洲国家股票的需求，中国的科技巨头们正在将曾经不可一世的美国同行们甩在身后，许多投资者表示，中国股票的优异表现仍有延续的空间。【原文：Chinese tech megacaps are leaving their once-unbeatable US peers in the dust as DeepSeek spurs demand for the Asian nation’s stocks, an outperformance that many investors say has room to extend.】

item.title: 日本债券将把收益率最低的主要市场的宝座拱手让给中国
item.description: 日本投资者预计，中国基准 10 年期国债收益率今年将攀升至 2%，此举很可能使中国主权债务收益率降至主要市场最低水平。【原文：Japanese investors expect the nation’s benchmark 10-year government bond yield to climb as high as 2% this year in a move that looks likely to relegate China’s sovereign debt to the lowest yielding of major markets.】

item.title: 科技公司 ServiceNow 计划将总部迁至棕榈滩
item.description: 据两位熟悉该计划的人士透露，软件公司ServiceNow Inc正计划将其总部从硅谷迁至西棕榈滩，从而提升南佛罗里达城市作为金钱和权力中心的地位。【原文：Software firm ServiceNow Inc is planning to relocate its headquarters to West Palm Beach from Silicon Valley, according to two people familiar with the plans, boosting the South Florida city’s status as a nexus of money and power.】

item.title: 印度投资者押注恒生 ETF，欧盟军费开支计划催热国防股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 第一生命将向美国公司出让 97 亿美元的保险区块
item.description: 第一生命控股公司称，其美国子公司同意将总计约 97 亿美元保单准备金的保险块转让给一家再保险公司，以提高收益。【原文：Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc. said a US subsidiary agreed to transfer insurance blocks totaling about $9.7 billion in policy reserves to a reinsurance firm to improve earnings.】

item.title: 摩根大通调整企业内容管理，新任澳大利亚和东南亚地区主管
item.description: 摩根大通正在调整其股票资本市场的领导层，更换了澳大利亚股票资本市场的负责人，并任命了该领域东南亚地区的新负责人。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is rejigging its equity capital markets leadership by changing its head of Australia equity capital markets and appointing a new head of Southeast Asia in this area.】

item.title: 特朗普批评与日本签订的安保条约不均衡
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四批评了《美日安保条约》，强调美国有义务根据协议保护日本，但日本却没有提供同样的安全保证作为回报。【原文：US President Donald Trump on Thursday criticized the US-Japan Security Treaty, highlighting how the US is obliged to protect Japan under the agreement but Japan does not offer the same security guarantees in return.】

item.title: 关注中国经济增长，稳定人民币为改善流动性带来希望
item.description: 随着人民币反弹和中国政府雄心勃勃的经济增长目标为央行增加流动性铺平了道路，中国银行系统现金状况紧张的交易员们最糟糕的日子可能已经过去。【原文：The worst may be over for traders grappling with tight cash conditions in China’s banking system, as the yuan’s rebound and Beijing’s ambitious growth target pave the way for a liquidity boost from the central bank.】

item.title: 黑暗舰队拆除行动是陷入困境的废品收购站的生命线
item.description: 印度的拆船厂一直没有生意，而老旧的油轮却一直在全球各地运送非法石油。现在，随着制裁执法的收紧和个别船只受到审查，一些船厂看到了扭转业务的机会。【原文：Indian ship-breaking yards have been starved of business while aging tankers were kept afloat to carry illicit oil around the globe. Now, as sanctions enforcement tightens and individual vessels come under scrutiny, some are seeing an opportunity to turn their business around.】

item.title: 加拿大原油免受特朗普对邻国征收关税的影响
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对来自加拿大和墨西哥的部分进口商品实行了为期一个月的关税缓和措施，原油是这一措施的受益者之一。【原文：Crude is among the beneficiaries of President Donald Trump’s one-month reprieve on tariffs for some imports from Canada and Mexico, a boost to oil industry leaders initially concerned that it wouldn’t secure relief.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Triata 增长 39%，DeepSeek 提高了基金回报率
item.description: 受 DeepSeek 和 Unitree Robotics 的刺激，中国股市上月出现反弹，从而提高了几家对冲基金和只做多头的基金的收益。【原文：A rally in Chinese stocks tied to excitement over DeepSeek and Unitree Robotics lifted returns of several hedge and long-only funds last month.】

item.title: 美国发现进口鸡蛋非常困难
item.description: 美国官员正在大洋彼岸寻找足够的鸡蛋，以缓解鸡蛋短缺造成的价格飙升，迫使杂货店限制顾客购买，餐馆增加附加费。【原文：US officials are searching across oceans to find enough eggs to ease a shortage that’s sent prices soaring, forcing grocery stores to limit customer purchases and restaurants to add surcharges.】

item.title: 汇丰亚太区杠杆与收购融资联席主管即将卸任
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司亚太区杠杆和收购融资联席主管 Rachel Watson 将于 3 月底离职。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s co-head of leveraged and acquisition finance for Asia Pacific, Rachel Watson, will be stepping down end March, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥将审查对华关税，特朗普可能获胜
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆表示，墨西哥将重新审议对中国货物征收关税的问题，此举可能会让特朗普政府在推动建立 "北美堡垒 "以阻止来自亚洲国家的货物方面取得胜利。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said her country would review tariffs on Chinese shipments, a move that could give the Trump administration a win in its push to build a “Fortress North America” that blocks shipments from the Asian nation.】
